short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically refresh the page every 1 minute.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for kiosk applications where you need the page to refresh after a specific time. There is no configuration needed, just add the extension or install it through Google Admin. There is also Auto Refresh 5 Min and Auto Refresh 15 Min extensions.
